resources.string: Play music on a nearby rPi music box!
Search a nearby rPi music box

The app needs access to coarse location in order to be able to search for nearby music box.\n\nYou also need to know that the app hasn\'t access to your real location, it has only access to the device\'s location relative to other devices (using WiFi and Bluetooth).
The app can\'t search for nearby music box unless it has been granted the permission to access to coarse location.\n\nYou can go to app\'s settings screen to change that.
